name: World of Soccer
overview: Your objective is to manage a club in one of the 5 major leagues (English, German, Italian, Argentinian or Spanish) and to guide your team to win 3 major titles in one season -The League Champion the League Cup and the World Club Cup. You start your career in World of Soccer as an "out of work" and inexperienced manager looking for a new club, so you will need to scan the Job Vacancies to see what offers are available for a manager of your status. Your status in world football is measured by your success and the status points you have accumulated.
